title: Muscle Shift
description: Muscle Shift is an exciting racing game that enables you to switch your superpower to overcome obstacles. With super-sized muscular hands, you can smash through any barriers obstructing your path. Alternatively, you can inflate your leg muscles to achieve faster speeds and gain an edge over your competitors. Transform into a ball shape to bounce and accelerate when falling down. Compete against others to showcase your superior muscle shape and leave them in your dust. Get ready to rush and assert your dominance in the ultimate showdown of muscular prowess!
